mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CoPhotos (co_targetId, co_type, co_uuId, co_fileName, co_filePath, co_fileUrl, co_fileDownloadPath, co_fileSize) VALUES (#{co_targetId}, #{co_type}, #{co_uuId}, #{co_fileName}, #{co_filePath}, #{co_fileUrl}, #{co_fileDownloadPath}, #{co_fileSize})
mapper.select: select co_photoId, co_targetId, co_type, co_uuId, co_fileName, co_filePath, co_fileUrl, co_fileDownloadPath, co_fileSize from CoPhotos where co_targetId = #{co_projectId} and co_type = 'PROJECT'
select co_photoId, co_targetId, co_type, co_uuId, co_fileName, co_filePath, co_fileUrl, co_fileDownloadPath, co_fileSize from CoPhotos where co_targetId = #{co_studyId} and co_type = 'STUDY'
select co_targetId, co_type, co_uuId, co_fileName, co_filePath, co_fileUrl, co_fileDownloadPath, co_fileSize from CoPhotos where co_uuId = #{co_uuId}
